Flow.description: ESC-977 | Flow used to setup appropriate contract data used for SAP RE integration ESC-1703: Fault path added ESC-1665: Flow Updated ESC-1699: Flow Updated ESC- 1731: Flow Updated to include Active Land Contacts ESC-1763: Flow Updated for Non-Paid Condition Type ESC-1669: Flow Updated ESC-1768: Flow updates for Contract posting parameter ESC-1748: Flow updated

formulas.description: Converting currency value into number to assign to AnnualContractPayment.Quantity so that SAP will accept it
formulas.name: formulaCurrencyValueConversion
formulaOccupierConditionType_Create
formulas.expression: IF(OR({!SPEN_ServiceOnlyCreate}== true,{!chkRentalOnly_Create}==true), 'VCL0', CASE({!Loop_Through_Selection.Name}, 'Back Payment', 'VFL0', 'One Off Payment', 'VFL0', CASE(TEXT({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_Land_Interest_Type__c}), 'Occupier', 'VEL0', 'Owner-Occupier', 'VEL0','')))

formulas.name: formulaOccupierPeriodPosting_Create
formulas.expression: IF(AND({!Loop_Through_Selection.Name}=='One Off Payment',{!SPEN_CreateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==true), CASE({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_ConsentType__c}, 'Servitude','UE - Statistical One-Time Posting', 'Easement','UE - Statistical One-Time Posting', 'Lease','PE - Statistical Periodic Posting', 'Closed Couple Lease','PE - Statistical Periodic Posting','UR - One-Time Posting'),IF(AND({!Loop_Through_Selection.Name}=='One Off Payment',{!SPEN_CreateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==false), CASE({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_ConsentType__c}, 'Lease','PR - Periodic Posting', 'Closed Couple Lease','PR - Periodic Posting','UR - One-Time Posting'), IF(AND(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_Land_Interest_Type__c},'Owner-Occupier'),{!chkRentalOnly_Create}==true, {!SPEN_ServiceOnlyCreate}==false,{!SPEN_NonPaidCreate}==false), 'PR - Periodic Posting', IF( OR({!SPEN_ServiceOnlyCreate}==true,{!SPEN_NonPaidCreate}==true,{!chkRentalOnly_Create}==true), 'PE - Statistical Periodic Posting', CASE({!Loop_Through_Selection.Name}, 'Back Payment', 'UR - One-Time Posting', 'PR - Periodic Posting' ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: formulaOccupierPeriodPosting_Update
formulas.expression: IF(AND({!Loop_Through_Selection_of_Existing.SPEN_Apparatus_Description__c}=='One Off Payment',{!SPEN_UpdateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==true), CASE({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_ConsentType__c}, 'Servitude','UE - Statistical One-Time Posting', 'Easement','UE - Statistical One-Time Posting', 'Lease','PE - Statistical Periodic Posting', 'Closed Couple Lease','PE - Statistical Periodic Posting','UR - One-Time Posting'),IF(AND({!Loop_Through_Selection_of_Existing.SPEN_Apparatus_Description__c}=='One Off Payment',{!SPEN_UpdateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==false), CASE({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_ConsentType__c}, 'Lease','PR - Periodic Posting', 'Closed Couple Lease','PR - Periodic Posting','UR - One-Time Posting'), IF(AND(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_Land_Interest_Type__c},'Owner-Occupier'),{!chkRentalOnly_Update}==true, {!SPEN_ServiceOnlyUpdate}==false,{!SPEN_NonPaidUpdate}==false), 'PR - Periodic Posting', IF( OR({!SPEN_ServiceOnlyUpdate}==true,{!SPEN_NonPaidUpdate}==true,{!chkRentalOnly_Update}==true), 'PE - Statistical Periodic Posting', CASE({!Loop_Through_Selection_of_Existing.SPEN_Apparatus_Description__c}, 'Back Payment', 'UR - One-Time Posting', 'PR - Periodic Posting' ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: formulaOwnerPeriodPosting_Create
formulas.expression: IF(AND({!Loop_Through_Selection.Name}=='One Off Payment',{!SPEN_CreateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==true), CASE({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_ConsentType__c}, 'Servitude','UE - Statistical One-Time Posting', 'Easement','UE - Statistical One-Time Posting', 'Lease','PE - Statistical Periodic Posting', 'Closed Couple Lease','PE - Statistical Periodic Posting','UR - One-Time Posting'),IF(AND({!Loop_Through_Selection.Name}=='One Off Payment',{!SPEN_CreateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==false), CASE({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_ConsentType__c}, 'Lease','PR - Periodic Posting', 'Closed Couple Lease','PR - Periodic Posting','UR - One-Time Posting'), IF(AND(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_Land_Interest_Type__c},'Owner-Occupier'),{!chkRentalOnly_Create}==true, {!SPEN_ServiceOnlyCreate}==false,{!SPEN_NonPaidCreate}==false), 'PR - Periodic Posting', IF( OR({!SPEN_ServiceOnlyCreate}==true,{!SPEN_NonPaidCreate}==true,{!chkRentalOnly_Create}==true), 'PE - Statistical Periodic Posting', CASE({!Loop_Through_Selection.Name}, 'Back Payment', 'UR - One-Time Posting', 'PR - Periodic Posting' ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: formulaOwnerPeriodPosting_Update
formulas.expression: IF(AND({!Loop_Through_Selection_of_Existing.SPEN_Apparatus_Description__c}=='One Off Payment',{!SPEN_UpdateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==true), CASE({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_ConsentType__c}, 'Servitude','UE - Statistical One-Time Posting', 'Easement','UE - Statistical One-Time Posting', 'Lease','PE - Statistical Periodic Posting', 'Closed Couple Lease','PE - Statistical Periodic Posting','UR - One-Time Posting'),IF(AND({!Loop_Through_Selection_of_Existing.SPEN_Apparatus_Description__c}=='One Off Payment',{!SPEN_UpdateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==false), CASE({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_ConsentType__c}, 'Lease','PR - Periodic Posting', 'Closed Couple Lease','PR - Periodic Posting','UR - One-Time Posting'), IF(AND(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_Land_Interest_Type__c},'Owner-Occupier'),{!chkRentalOnly_Update}==true,{!SPEN_ServiceOnlyUpdate}==false,{!SPEN_NonPaidUpdate}==false), 'PR - Periodic Posting', IF( OR({!SPEN_ServiceOnlyUpdate}==true,{!SPEN_NonPaidUpdate}==true,{!chkRentalOnly_Update}==true), 'PE - Statistical Periodic Posting', CASE({!Loop_Through_Selection_of_Existing.SPEN_Apparatus_Description__c}, 'Back Payment', 'UR - One-Time Posting', 'PR - Periodic Posting' ) ) ) ) )

formulas.name: SPEN_NonPaidSpecialPaymentsCreateFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!SPEN_CreateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==null && {!Loop_Through_Selection.Name}=='One Off Payment',false, IF({!SPEN_CreateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==true && {!Loop_Through_Selection.Name}=='One Off Payment',true, IF({!SPEN_CreateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==false && {!Loop_Through_Selection.Name}=='One Off Payment',false,false)))

formulas.name: SPEN_NonPaidSpecialPaymentsUpdateFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!SPEN_UpdateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==null && {!Loop_Through_Selection_of_Existing.SPEN_Apparatus_Description__c}=='One Off Payment',false, IF({!SPEN_UpdateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==true && {!Loop_Through_Selection_of_Existing.SPEN_Apparatus_Description__c}=='One Off Payment',true, IF({!SPEN_UpdateSpecialPayemntsNonPaid}==false && {!Loop_Through_Selection_of_Existing.SPEN_Apparatus_Description__c}=='One Off Payment',false,false)))

formulas.name: SPEN_PlannerGroup
formulas.expression: CASE({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_Job__r.SPEN_LicenseArea__c}, "SPM", "MPR", "SPM 132", "MPR","SPT","HO", CASE({!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_Job__r.SPEN_District__c}, "Lanarkshire", "CLY", "Glasgow & Clyde North", "CLY","Central & Fife","FOR","Edinburgh & Borders","FOR","Dumfries & Galloway","SOU","Ayrshire & Clyde South","SOU","NA"))

fields.name: txtro
fields.fieldText:
The following apparatus have already been configured for the land right {!Get_Land_Interest.Name} | {!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_LandLegalTitleNumber__c}


If you would like to edit any existing apparatus allocated to the Land Right, you may do so by selecting the appropriate items from the list to make your updates in the subsequent screens.

fields.name: secApparatus_Available_to_Link_to_Land_Interest
fields.fieldText: Apparatus Available to Link to Land Right

fields.name: txtroAvailableApparatus
fields.fieldText: The following apparatus can still be linked to land right {!Get_Land_Interest.Name} | {!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_LandLegalTitleNumber__c}

fields.name: txtroDisplayMessage
fields.fieldText:
{!Get_Land_Interest.Name} | {!Get_Land_Interest.SPEN_LandLegalTitleNumber__c}


The land right is already setup to be contracted with:

{!Get_Any_Existing_Partner_Association.SPEN_PartnerName__c} is the capacity of {!Get_Any_Existing_Partner_Association.SPEN_Partner__r.SPEN_AssociationType__c}


If you would like to amend this, please tick the checkbox to change the contracting party and continue to the next screen.

fields.name: checkboxLand_Interest_is_Ready_for_Contracting
fields.fieldText: Land Right is Ready for Contracting

validationRule.errorMessage: Both Service Only and Non-Paid cannot be selected together.
Both Service Only and Non-Pad cannot be selected together.

fields.name: SPEN_AlternatePayeeExistMessage
fields.fieldText: An Alternative Payee exists for this Land Right, the Alternative Payee will be removed from Land Right if confirmed.

validationRule.errorMessage: Both Service Only and Non-Paid cannot be selected together.
Both Service Only and Non-Paid cannot be selected together.

transforms.name: SPEN_MapLandContactsToPartnerExceptAlternatePayee
transforms.label: Map Land Contacts to Partner Except Alternate Payee
